def calculate_heap_height(N, arr):
    height = 1
    nodes = 1
    while nodes <= N:
        nodes *= 2
        height += 1
    return height - 1

def calculate_heap_height(N, arr):
    height = -1
    nodes = 1
    while nodes <= N:
        nodes *= 2
        height += 1
    return height - 1
